In addition the cabin provided spectacular views and great privacy. The cabin is in a great location to explore the nat'l parks and surronding sights. We would not hesitate to rent again and refer to others. Thank you Roger and Naomi for sharing your ranch and cabin.
Clean, comfortable, and relaxing and worked out fine for cooking.

We really enjoyed the quiet privacy, well furnished home, the tranquil surrounding in the badland and beautiful horses after exploring the Theodore Roosevelt N.P. each day! We wish we could stay longer! Highly recommended!
Gorgeous setting - quiet and private. Beautiful cabin, well appointed, and immaculately clean. Set up very well for families with kids. Highly recommend. This is a very special place.

This place exceeded our expectations. 20 minutes from the park and Medora, but completely remote and relaxing. The place seems brand new and was as clean as any place I have stayed in. Roger is a great man, and we loved the 3 days spent there, couldn’t have asked for more. Our kids loved it, we loved it and it was exactly what we were hoping for.
My stay here was perfect! Would highly recommend and look forward to staying there again.

What an amazing location right outside of Medora! Only a few minutes out of town and feels like you’re in the middle of a National Park! The cabin was comfy and so functional for a family of 5 adults and 1 toddler. There were lots of toys, books, and all the supplies you might have forgotten! Highly recommend for your visit to Medora and/or Theodore Roosevelt National Park!! Thank you very much Roger!
P.S. the horses in the pasture around the cabin are kind and beautiful! Our toddler really fell in love with those horses!
Great clean place!! Very quiet secluded area-was the perfect little place to get away and relax!

Our stay at Davis Creek Cabin was absolutely perfect! The cabin is located in a beautiful, peaceful setting just minutes away from Medora and the South Unit of the park and about an hour away from the North Unit. It is clean and comfortable and wonderful for families!
This cabin was perfect for our little girls weekend get away. It was the perfect spot to connect with each other and disconnect from the rush of life.
A GREAT place to stay. Gives you a genuine North Dakota Ranch experience. And their horses are really friendly!
Very peaceful relaxing location, just so beautiful. Would highly recommend. Top Notch in every way.
The Dwell was a place away from home. Place was clean. It had everything we needed for the 3 days we were there. Michelle was very friendly and kind.
Great area for visiting TR National Park! Enjoyed the small town location and the little snow dusting. Super clean, great host, and a quiet area.
It was great staying at The Dwell! Michelle was super helpful and the place was peaceful! I loved staying there and if I’m ever in the area, would love to stay again! Highly recommended!!

When I arrived I remember calling Michelle afterward and telling her how great it smelled in the room I rented. Trust that this place is as beautiful as the pictures and extremely comfortable too.
Michelle's room has a kitchenette with coffee, mugs, creamer, and breakfast bars available!!
Location: unpaved parking lot. The building is right in front of a neighborhood that has about 700 residents in the entire town I believe!
Blackout curtains in sleeping area, self-controlled heating/cooling available but loud...kinda helps if you enjoy white noise.
Beautiful woman of GOD who is loving, caring, kind. She truly loves the LORD and loves to serve HIM.
Comfortable, easy to move in, the host is very nice.
The Dwell is a beautiful, quiet, clean, and features attractive style and amenities. Michelle was an amazing host with prompt and helpful tips for our stay. Would definitely stay here again.
Michelle is a great hostess. She checked on us to make sure we had everything we needed. Everything was great.

A cozy little room and bath not too far from the Theodore Roosevelt National Park. It is a little less than an hour to the Painted Canyon. A great option for the price. Michelle was a wonderful hostess, very friendly and attentive to our questions and comments. We appreciated the cleanliness of the space, as well as added touches like snacks, coffee, and water. We also appreciated the books about North Dakota and others made available in the room. For us, the trains going by (visible from the front windows) added to the peaceful country atmosphere. We felt very rested during our two-day stay at the Dwell.

Michelle’s place was perfect. It was about 40 minutes from Teddy Roosevelt NP for those looking to visit, and right off the highway and easy to find for those who are just stopping through. I loved the books she laid out for information, and the room was very cozy. Thinner walls, but that didn’t bother me, I could just hear snoring of the other visitor. No worries, because everything was exceptional. Coffee, snacks, books, recommendations, fresh linens, affordable and great host!

if you're looking for a place in range of the Theo Roosevelt Natl Park in Medora, this is a great option. I like how Michelle is revitalizing this classic motel and the care and attention she gave me as a guest. Very thoughtful touches, clean and minimalist design, and exceptional communication.
Clean, comfortable, and private. We will be booking again!
Perfectly appointed for our needs. Would stay again.

We had an amazing time at Carla’s place. She was the perfect host and responded immediately when I was having issues with the fireplace. They also took good care of us and plowed us out more than once during the snow storm. The house had all the amenities to make our stay enjoyable. Thank you so much! I know we will return soon!
Amazing host and house! Very understanding host! Thank you for everything!
Had a wonderful family get together!
Wonderful house.
It was a great place to stay. It had a great view and had penty of room for all of us. Thanks for sharing your place with us Carla and you were a good host.
Perfect space for larger family
The cabin was excellent, and just what we were looking for! It was spacious, loved the porch and ability to spend time outside. Carla was responsive and even allowed us to check in early.

The hunting lodge was a great place to stay for our family of 6 (with 4 kids). We loved the space, beautiful setup inside and outside, nice bedding, roomy kitchen and dining room. Entire family enjoyed a few rounds of playing pool/billiards downstairs. I liked the speedy Internet connection that was useful for remote work. Location is close to all local attractions but at the same time we appreciated privacy of the location. We recommend this lodge for any time of guests - families like ours and group getaways alike.

When we arrived the parking area was big enough for our vehicles. Access to the house was great. Coming into the Lodge is welcoming with lots of natural light. Wood work abounds with a rustic log cabin feel. Bedrooms were adequate with bathrooms and showers near by. Pool table was fun to play. Kitchen was big with a large table to seat many guests. Appliances were available for our needs.
Awesome variety of sleeping places, kitchen beyond well-stocked, so many great places to gather and enjoy family or friends.

We would highly recommend this place to others! There is plenty of space and the bedrooms allowed all of us to have our own personal space. We loved relaxing here after each day of visiting Theodore Roosevelt National Park. We loved the location and all the amenities such as laundry area, griddle, well-stocked kitchen and plenty of towels. We had a great time!

The Lodge was perfect for our crew of 8. We had plenty of comfortable spaces and completely enjoyed ourselves! We saw a doe with her brand new fawn on wobbly legs while we were sitting out on the deck...it was so cool!
I would advise against using g**gle maps to locate this place- we were very much taken off course! Carla was immediately responsive when we contacted her and was very helpful.
The sign at the bottom of the driveway does not say The Lodge- it says JJ Outfitters. This also was confusing- it all worked out in the end and we had a great time!! I absolutely recommend this rental!
You have a beautiful home. The views were amazing! The home is very spacious and perfect for a large family. We would definitely stay again. Thank you for opening your home to our family!

The spacious lodge allowed us to host many large family meals. We were able to cook together and make great-grandmother’s yeast rolls and pies. The kitchen is stocked with everything you need for cooking and serving for a large group. Most of us traveled over a thousand miles to be together and we felt right at home. The views are spectacular. I cannot imagine a more ideal arrangement!
Great place. Great owner. Will definitely be back.
Perfect place for our team/girls to stay for the weekend.
Awesome place beautiful view
The most serene piece of land! Such a beautiful place to stay with plenty of room for large families! Would 100% recommend to others. Carla is fantastic to communicate with!
Loved the cabin! Great price, beautiful view, awesome for a large group! Cabin was clean and well stocked. Carla is super responsive and accommodating! Would definitely rent again!
It was a wonderful place to stay. Lots of room for activities. We would stay there again.
Clean and well prepared!

We loved our stay at The Ranch! Highly recommend. Main Pros: The home exceeded our expectations with great space for our larger group. The kitchen was well stocked and clean, and the big table/deck was good for meals. Loved the coffee station! Beautiful yard with petrified wood stumps/logs and trees. Nice to have access to washer/dryer when traveling with kids. Great natural light with big beautiful windows and a view to enjoy. Private quiet location. Minor Cons: had to be a bit creative with childproofing the 2 staircases for our youngest group members. Low water pressure in the showers. A few safety concerns but Carla was made aware and I am sure she’ll address them!
Overall I highly recommend this location. Close enough to do a day trip to Medora and explore the national park too. Good for families or a hunting group.
Quiet neighbourhood and cozy
Great location, comfortable space, plenty of parking space and the host was extremely helpful!
The listing was great and spacious
We really enjoyed our stay here!

This house was perfect for us to meet halfway and spend the weekend together. We live in two different towns and we travel to different areas in North Dakota to meet and stay for the weekend and staying here definitely now will be one of our reoccurring places to rent stay. Brooke was so great to work with and so accommodating. Highly recommend this cute spot.

Best part of this place is the bed- Soooo comfortable!! Very cute decor & Brooke was wonderful to work with and very flexible with us when we were having truck issues. I also loved how she had dog dishes and a bed ready for our pup! Only thing about the place that I wish was different was the shower.. it definitely has its quirks… everything else was great!
Brooke was very kind and accommodating when I wanted to add another day. Her place is in a perfect spot close to everything and it was so cozy. I would highly recommend staying at her place.
We felt very good at Brook's house, everything was perfect. She even came to remove the snow at 6 am. She is an excellent host.
Easy logistics. Place is just as advertised. Clean, easy, good amenities. Would happily stay here again.
I was just passing through town and needed somewhere to stay overnight with my dog and it was perfect! The house was clean and cozy, bed was super comfortable and she even had a little dog bed :)

The wife and I like to come to the big city (we are from Killdeer) to have date nights and escape from time to time. Brooke's place was a welcomed retreat!! The house and neighborhood are very quiet. The house was clean, cozy & welcoming! We'll definitely stay again.
The stay was very cozy and exactly what we were looking for.
Perfect, exactly as listed!

Brookes place was great! I’m a traveling nurse and so I was so appreciative of how well stocked the kitchen was. Brooke went above and beyond and even had a tree up for me since she knew I was staying over Christmas! She was very patient with me as I figured out the area too. For long or short stays I would highly recommend! It is a full house and has everything one would need. Lots of space! And the bed was very comfortable
Wonderful stay! We loved Brooke’s place so much. It was super cozy, comfy, inviting and CLEAN. We will definitely stay again next time we’re in the area!
Totally fell in love with this house.
What a great comfortable space for us and the dogs! Perfectly situated to go see TR national park.
Cute and cozy! My boyfriend and I stayed here for a weekend and it had everything we needed! The bed is heavenly!

Brookes place was so perfect for our last night on the road. We wished we could have picked the house up and moved it to our hometown. Thoughtfully decorated and the workout equipment was much appreciated even if we didn’t workout (; Will keep this on our list of places to stay!
Loved this home and stay! Fun, festive decor and lots of nice touches in and around the house. Would definitely stay here again.
Adorable, clean & fair price. We stayed while passing through and absolutely would stay again. The host had everything thoughtfully prepared.
Great place to stay. Private and felt right at home. Loraine was very responsive.
Loraine was great -very welcoming. Will stay here again when we are in the area.
Thank you Lorraine for your concern and hospitality. I greatly appreciated your communication and responsiveness.
Very caring host. Gave very good recommendations on what to do around. And the price is great 👍

We had a great stay at Lorraine’s place! The setup was great, and Lorraine was super nice and hospitable. She had some extra touches that were nice and we enjoyed talking to her upon arrival! I definitely recommend staying here!

Right from the get go Loraine was there to guide us every step of the way. She had some wonderful pamphlets on a table when you walked in the door to give you ideas of where to go and eat and places of interest to visit.
Lorraine is a very kind, sweet and responsive host! The bnb itself is a spacious finished basement so just be aware you will hear people above you if that’s not your thing.
Loraine and Mark were great hosts! Always on hand to make sure we were taken care of!
Loraine was very accommodating and helpful. The place was roomy with everything there we needed to cook our own meals. The outdoor space was beautiful. Thoroughly enjoyed the stay!
Very nice place to stay. Very scenic area. Nice rooms and kitchen area. Plenty of space for 4 people. Off the beaten path.
Had a great stay scenery was amazing!

We appreciated the food provided in the fridge so we didn't have to pack as much. The milk and eggs were helpful because they're hard to pack. This would be a great place in the summer also. Super place for families to enjoy games that she has there.
a very good time, very welcoming people, a beautiful and quiet place
had a great weekend at Lorain's place. beautiful home with everything needed. Thank you.
we had an amazing experience, she was really helpful and showed us around its much nicer than it's looks like
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in North Dakota. The hosts were fantastic and we will definitely be staying here again if back in the area.
Had a quick overnight stay in Gladstone. Loraine was great. The place is nice and very accessible. Would stay again if passing through ND. Thanks!!

Had a wonderful stay with our family. We got an extra bonus with a tour of their Halloween decorations. Loraine was extremely responsive and accommodating. She welcomed us in with a flashlight and showed us where to park, then gave us a tour of the space so we knew where everything was and how it worked. Although we didn’t eat any, there was lots of food available. The linens were very clean and nice. Lots of things to do at this little spot! We didn’t get to enjoy the deck as we didn’t stay long, but we are already planning a trip back and will be sure to spend some time out there.
Second visit to Loraine’s place, already looking forward to our next trip to ND. Thanks for your hospitality!

A very nice, quiet lace. Was clean and was well stocked with amnesties.
The kitchen had a good selection of pots, pans and utensil, also had plenty dinnerware, glasses and cutlery. The little game room with darts , goose ball and board games was nice too. Highly recommend these accommodations
Lorraine was awesome! So kind, very clean and felt very safe as three female travelers! Thanks so much!

What a lovely place. Lorraine met us in the drive and made sure we knew where everything was. Turned on the outside waterfall so we could enjoy a snack and a glass of wine outside.
Also included breakfast which was a great treat!

We had a little get away and this was a special place. The hosts were amazing. Great recommendations for the surrounding area. This place had a very homey feeling and was very welcoming. Great fishing! We plan to return soon! Thank you for the wonderful stay!

Loraine was a wonderful host! We spent one night here during our road trip across the national parks in the area and felt right at home. Loraine went out of her way to greet us and give us a tour of the place. Neighborhood is very quiet and the added amenities that were not listed were a nice touch. Place was cozy and an awesome deal.

One of the cleanest and well equipped locations thatI have stayed in. Loraine is very very nice and has done a nice job putting her location together. Only 40 minutes from Theodore Roosevelt National Park so would recommend to anyone visiting the area.

What an incredibly beautiful, peaceful place. Hostess with the mostest greeted us warmly and made sure we had all the information we needed. She had great suggestions of things to do and places to eat.

This is a great place to stay. It is off the beaten path and very private. Loraine and her husband are great hosts. They thought of every possible need and she explained every thing carefully. Their written instructions were very professional. Eggs, bread and cereal and milk were a bonus. I highly recommend this place and Loraine

Loraine's place was clean and quiet, we arrived tired and hungry the restaurant she suggested was top notch. We fell asleep fast woke up early and had to travel to our next destination. Was not able to enjoy anything else. Loraine was very helpful and answered all our questions. Nice place to visit.

We were in the midst of an extended road trip and needed a few days to cook our own meals and do laundry. Loraine's place served this purpose well and at a reasonable price. We used all of the kitchen appliances and all worked well. The washer and dryer also worked perfectly.
Loraine met us on arrival and gave us a very thorough introduction to her place. She was available by phone at even very early hours.
We used one day to visit the north unit of TRNP and the other to visit the south unit. We also drove the Enchanted highway. Since we were coming from the east, we stopped in Bismarck to load up on groceries, as we were warned that Gladstone doesn't have any stores or services.
The hot water was a big finicky, but Loraine let us know she didn't mind us calling to reset the heater at any hour, even as early as 3am!
While we visited, temperatures were in the high 90's, but the basement apartment stayed very comfortable. Temperature was never an issue.

Loraine & Mark were great hosts. We greatly appreciated the breakfast items that were left for us on our arrival. The property was very clean and the beds were comfortable. It is in a great location for visiting the Theodore Roosevelt NP and the surrounding area. The little town is very quiet and we had undisturbed sleep every night. We had everything we needed for our stay, and were also able to use the grill on the upstairs deck, which was very nice. Overall we enjoyed our stay.
This was a very nice guest suite, completely stocked, even with breakfast food since Gladstone has no food shopping. Such a great courtesy!!

Loved staying at Loraine’s was just what we needed after a long day of travel as a family. Most everything was as originally described, though the basement didn’t have the portable fans as listed, which would have been nice in the August heat. Would stay here again though!

After a long day on the road, it was great to be welcomed by her. She happily explained everything to us and gave us many ideas of how to spend our free time. Unlike other Airbnbs, she even had food for us for breakfast!
Great experience
Loraine and her place are both lovely :)
A great setting and a great place. Host was very helpful and gave us tour of the place. We only stayed one night and if we return to this area, will stay longer.
Great little find. Small town, cute place., close to the highway and Lorraine was wonderful

Mark and Lorraine are fantastic! They are very kind and extremely helpful and welcoming. Their place is very clean and they go above and beyond to make sure that their guests are taken care of, even going so far as to provide breakfast. I am very glad that we chose to stay here and would certainly recommend it.

Loraine was an amazing host! She was very friendly and incredibly kind, knew around the area thoroughly and gave great recommendations. The place was pretty clean and had a fully functional kitchen. Kits of board games and other amenities as well.
Loraine was fantastic! Really helpful and made me feel right at home. The room was very big and nice and was also clean. Would definitely stay here again if I ever am in this part of North Dakota.
We had a nice stay. We enjoyed the games that were provided and the food for breakfast. The deck was peaceful and the house was spacious. Loraine was very nice and friendly.

We had a wonderful stay at Loraine’s place. It was very quiet and peaceful. Loraine was a very thoughtful host, greeting us and giving us a tour even though it was late in the day. The amenities and breakfast items were very appreciated. Wished we could’ve stayed there longer!

Super host , super nice and who pays attention to her guests! Loraine makes sure everything is perfect for her guests and that is appreciated! She even let us borrow the kayaks so we could go for a ride along the river ! Perfect place for resting while driving home to minnesota !

Great place to stay. Loraine and her husband are great. The beds were comfortable and the house was very clean. It was very nice to have breakfast items provided. They went above and beyond to make our stay wonderful. Would recommend this place to anyone looking for a place to stay.
We had a lovely stay. Loraine was very kind , welcoming, and helpful. The place is as described , in a quiet lovely town.

This basement apartment exceeded mine and my two teenage children’s needs. Clean and peaceful. Dickinson is only about 15 minutes away. We did a lot of exploring and was very grateful to relax in this charming Airbnb. Lovely views from the entrance or on the upper deck.
The milk, cereal, eggs and toast was a nice touch too!
Great location. Nice accommodations. we enjoyed our stay!
Loraine was helpful, friendly, and a wonderful host!

Wonderful stay at Loraine's rental. Needed a place to stay after a long day of driving and visiting Teddy Roosevelt National Park and this place was perfect. Very clean with comfortable beds and breakfast items provided for the next morning. This rental is also a great starting point to enjoy the sculptures of the Enchanted Highway. Would love to stay here again when we come back to enjoy the area a bit longer. Thanks for the great stay Loraine.
Convenient location, great setting/ view. Spacious. Fresh eggs and breakfast items were provided, a nice touch!
Special location!!
Lorraine was an extremely gracious and friendly host and her home was absolutely beautiful. Will definitely stay here again if the chance arrives.
This place was so nice and clean! The host was so kind and helpful. I would definitely recommend!!! We will definitely book again if we end up that way!!!
Great place, more of a B an B than I expected! Breafast supplied. Views are increidble and the space is cozy. Loraine was very helpful!
Lorraine was friendly and showed us around the place right away! She even shared some rhubarb with us! The price is great for a 2 bedroom stay.

Super lovely a d friendly hosts.
Wonderful amenities and view!
Would recommend highly.

My family was roadtripping and uncertain of a stopover destination until only a few hours before our stay - Loraine was incredibly responsive and accommodating to make last-minute arrangements for us and even stayed up late to give us the tour! Can't thank our hosts enough for a good night's sleep. Having a few items provided to make breakfast before hitting the road was a fantastic cherry on top.
I would recommend this stay.
